1: pa gang yin pa//yi <mistake>sge</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> dang mnyam ldan pa'i//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur bya//de bzhin dbus las dbu ma <mistake>yang//me</mistake> mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i//lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//me <mistake>mtsha</mistake>
2: 'dab <mistake>mde</mistake> bzhin <mistake>dang//byang</mistake> las dang po sbyor ba <mistake>yis//byanr</mistake> las tha ma 'gyur bar bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du//lan gnyis par ni <mistake>pa rzod</mistake> par bya//de bzhin nub kyi dang po <mistake>yang//lan</mistake> gnyis
3: par ni brjod par bya//me mtshams pa yi stan ldan <mistake>pa// byang</mistake> las dang po 'gyur bar bya//thig le a yig ldan pa <mistake>yi//por</mistake> chen rdo rje nyi ma <mistake>lin//zhes</mistake> <mistake>bcon</mistake> ldan <mistake>'da</mistake> dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//
4: dbus las dbu ma bzung nas su//me mtshams 'dab ma'i stan ldan pa'i//lho las dbu ma <mistake>'gyor</mistake> bar bya//bden bral <mistake>hyi</mistake> rol gnas pa <mistake>dang//dbus</mistake> las dbu ma sbyor ba <mistake>dang//tsheg</mistake> drag mnyam
5: por ldan pa <mistake>yi//lhols</mistake> dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs <mistake>so///dbus</mistake> las dbu ma de <mistake>bzhindu//me</mistake>
6: mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i//lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin//byang las dang po sbyor ba yi//byang las tha ma 'gyur bar bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la//
7: thig le u yig sbyor <mistake>pa'o//zhes</mistake> bcom ldan <mistake>'dgs</mistake> dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//dbus las dbu ma bzung ba <mistake>dang//me</mistake> mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i//lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//byang
8: las bzhi pa gang yin <mistake>dang//me</mistake> mtshams 'og tu ldan pa yi//dbus las tha ma 'byung bar bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du//thig le dang ni mnyam ldan no//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal <mistake>rdor</mistake>
